lexUnit.name: abuse.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to cruelly mistreat, esp. physically or sexually

sentence.text: Parents who abuse their children have often been abused themselves , Dr Hans Steiner , consultant paediatrician and senior lecturer in child health at Newcastle University , told the congress .
` Mr. Bennet , how can you abuse your own children in such a way ?
Whilst the latter was away , the defendant took over her teaching duties and made use of his position to abuse the girl sexually .
DOCTORS have determined that Woody Allen did not sexually abuse one of the children he adopted with his estranged partner Mia Farrow , representatives for both sides said yesterday .
She added said that she had believed Allen had homosexual tendencies and she had concerns that he would sexually abuse Satchel .
I said , ` Were you aware that you might threaten , abuse or insult him ? "
You know not the innocence you abuse so freely Would to God that instead of a woman and my sister , any man breathing had dared to give himself half the airs you have done .
There they could plunder and abuse the local Christian peasantry with impunity , even dispossessing them from their lands .
I might abuse my kids , but where 's the harm in that ?
I was going to abuse her .
It made me think I was going to abuse my own kids .
I even want you to abuse and degrade me .
We can abuse or be abused by anyone .
For Pleasant Run to continue to serve abused and neglected children and their families , we need your support .
